text: No potom Allakh pomog vam: nizvol pokoy na serdtse Svoyego poslannika i veruyushchikh i poslal Svoikh nezrimykh voinov-angelov, kotoryye podderzhali vas, i vy stoyko prodolzhali srazhat'sya i oderzhali pobedu. Allakh zastavil vashikh vragov ispytat' gorech' porazheniya. Eto - nakazaniye dlya neveruyushchikh v zemnom mire
